trans-unit.source: Composition of allocators is not recommended at this level due to inflexibility of dynamic interfaces and inefficiencies caused by cascaded multiple calls. Instead, compose allocators using the static interface defined in std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks, then adapt the composed allocator to ISharedAllocator (possibly by using CSharedAllocatorImpl below).
trans-unit.target: 由于动态接口的灵活性以及级联的多个调用导致的效率低下，因此不建议在此级别上分配分配器。取而代之的是，使用 std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks 中定义的静态接口组成分配器，然后将组成的分配器修改为 ISharedAllocator （可能使用下面的 CSharedAllocatorImpl ）。

trans-unit.source: Composition of allocators is not recommended at this level due to inflexibility of dynamic interfaces and inefficiencies caused by cascaded multiple calls. Instead, compose allocators using the static interface defined in std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks, then adapt the composed allocator to RCIAllocator (possibly by using allocatorObject below).
trans-unit.target: 由于动态接口的灵活性以及级联的多个调用导致的效率低下，因此不建议在此级别上分配分配器。取而代之的是，使用 std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks 中定义的静态接口来编写分配器，然后将组合的分配器改编为 RCIAllocator （可能使用下面的 allocatorObject ）。

trans-unit.source: Composition of allocators is not recommended at this level due to inflexibility of dynamic interfaces and inefficiencies caused by cascaded multiple calls. Instead, compose allocators using the static interface defined in std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks, then adapt the composed allocator to RCISharedAllocator (possibly by using sharedAllocatorObject below).
trans-unit.target: 由于动态接口的灵活性以及级联的多个调用导致的效率低下，因此不建议在此级别上分配分配器。取而代之的是，使用 std.experimental.allocator.building_blocks 中定义的静态接口组成分配器，然后将组合的分配器修改为 RCISharedAllocator （可能使用下面的 sharedAllocatorObject ）。

trans-unit.source: Compute HMAC digests of arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的HMAC摘要。

trans-unit.source: Compute MD5 hash of arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的MD5哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Compute MOD bits matching this argument type to wild parameter type.
trans-unit.target: 计算与 this 参数类型匹配的MOD位，以匹配野生参数类型。

trans-unit.source: Compute MurmurHash of arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的MurmurHash。

trans-unit.source: Compute RIPEMD-160 hash of arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的RIPEMD-160哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Compute SHA1 and SHA2 hashes of arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的SHA1和SHA2哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Compute column number at the end of the printed form of the string, assuming the string starts in the leftmost column, which is numbered starting from 0.
trans-unit.target: 计算字符串打印形式末尾的列号,假设字符串从最左边的列开始,该列从0开始编号。

trans-unit.source: Compute covariance of parameters this and p as determined by the storage classes of both.
trans-unit.target: 计算由两者的存储类别确定的参数 this 和 p 的协方差。

trans-unit.source: Compute digests such as md5, sha1 and crc32.
trans-unit.target: 计算摘要,如md5、sha1和crc32。

trans-unit.source: Compute hash function for Object.
trans-unit.target: 计算对象的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: Compute n * 2<sup>exp</sup>
trans-unit.target: 计算n * 2 <sup>exp</sup>

trans-unit.source: Compute number of elements for a (possibly multidimensional) static array, or 1 for other types.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个(可能是多维)静态数组的元素数,其他类型的元素数为1。

trans-unit.source: Compute size of a dt
trans-unit.target: 计算dt的大小

trans-unit.source: Compute square root of x.
trans-unit.target: 计算x的平方根。

trans-unit.source: Compute the Adler-32 checksum of a buffer's worth of data.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个缓冲区数据的Adler-32校验和。

trans-unit.source: Compute the CRC32 checksum of a buffer's worth of data.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个缓冲区数据的CRC32校验和。

trans-unit.source: Compute the Fourier transform of range using the Ο(N log N) Cooley-Tukey Algorithm. range must be a random-access range with slicing and a length equal to size as provided at the construction of this object. The contents of range can be either numeric types, which will be interpreted as pure real values, or complex types with properties or members .re and .im that can be read.
trans-unit.target: 使用Ο（ N log N ）Cooley-Tukey算法计算距离的傅立叶变换。 range 必须是具有切片的随机访问范围，并且长度等于此对象构造时提供的 size 。range的内容可以是数字类型（将被解释为纯实值），也可以是具有属性或可以读取的成员 .re 和 .im 的复杂类型。

trans-unit.source: Compute the sum of binary logarithms of the input range r. The error of this method is much smaller than with a naive sum of log2.
trans-unit.target: 计算输入范围 r 的二进制对数之和。这种方法的错误比使用log2天真之和小得多。

trans-unit.source: Compute the value of an integer x, raised to the power of a positive integer n.
trans-unit.target: 计算整数x的值,升到正整数n的幂。

trans-unit.source: Compute the value of x <sup>n</sup>, where n is an integer
trans-unit.target: 计算x <sup>n</sup>的值，其中n是整数

trans-unit.source: Computes entropy of input range r in bits. This function assumes (without checking) that the values in r are all in [0, 1]. For the entropy to be meaningful, often r should be normalized too (i.e., its values should sum to 1). The two-parameter version stops evaluating as soon as the intermediate result is greater than or equal to max.
trans-unit.target: 以位为单位计算输入范围 r 的熵。该函数假定（不检查） r 中的值全部在 [0, 1] 。为了使熵有意义，通常还应将 r 标准化（即，其值之和应为1）。一旦中间结果大于或等于 max ，则两参数版本将停止评估。

trans-unit.source: Computes Euclidean distance between input ranges a and b. The two ranges must have the same length. The three-parameter version stops computation as soon as the distance is greater than or equal to limit (this is useful to save computation if a small distance is sought).
trans-unit.target: 计算输入范围 a 和 b 之间的欧几里得距离。两个范围必须具有相同的长度。当距离大于或等于 limit ，三参数版本将立即停止计算（如果需要较小的距离，这将有助于节省计算时间）。

trans-unit.source: Computes MurmurHash hashes of arbitrary data. MurmurHash is a non-cryptographic hash function suitable for general hash-based lookup. It is optimized for x86 but can be used on all architectures.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的MurmurHash哈希值。MurmurHash是一种非加密哈希函数，适用于基于常规哈希的常规查找。它针对x86进行了优化，但可以在所有体系结构上使用。

trans-unit.source: Computes Cartesian product of two ranges.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个范围的笛卡尔积。

trans-unit.source: Computes MD5 hashes of arbitrary data. MD5 hashes are 16 byte quantities that are like a checksum or CRC, but are more robust.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的MD5哈希值。MD5哈希是16个字节的量,类似于校验和或CRC,但更加稳健。

trans-unit.source: Computes RIPEMD-160 hashes of arbitrary data. RIPEMD-160 hashes are 20 byte quantities that are like a checksum or CRC, but are more robust.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的RIPEMD-160哈希值。RIPEMD-160散列是20字节的量,类似于校验和或CRC,但更加稳健。

trans-unit.source: Computes SHA1 and SHA2 hashes of arbitrary data. SHA hashes are 20 to 64 byte quantities (depending on the SHA algorithm) that are like a checksum or CRC, but are more robust.
trans-unit.target: 计算任意数据的SHA1和SHA2哈希值。SHA哈希值是20到64个字节的量(取决于SHA算法),类似于校验和或CRC,但更加稳健。

trans-unit.source: Computes a hash of the instance of a type.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个类型实例的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Computes a subrange of range starting at the first occurrence of range's minimum (respectively maximum) and with the same ending as range, or the empty range if range itself is empty.
trans-unit.target: 计算范围的子 range ，该范围的范围从第一次出现的 range 的最小值（分别是最大值）开始，并以 range 结束，如果 range 本身为空，则为空范围。

trans-unit.source: Computes an index for r based on the comparison less. The index is a sorted array of pointers or indices into the original range. This technique is similar to sorting, but it is more flexible because (1) it allows "sorting" of immutable collections, (2) allows binary search even if the original collection does not offer random access, (3) allows multiple indexes, each on a different predicate, and (4) may be faster when dealing with large objects. However, using an index may also be slower under certain circumstances due to the extra indirection, and is always larger than a sorting-based solution because it needs space for the index in addition to the original collection. The complexity is the same as sort's.
trans-unit.target: 根据 less 的比较来计算 r 的索引。索引是原始范围内的指针或索引的排序数组。此技术类似于排序，但更为灵活，因为（1）它允许对不可变的集合进行“排序”；（2）即使原始集合不提供随机访问，也可以进行二进制搜索；（3）允许多个索引，每个索引（4）处理大对象时可能更快。但是，在某些情况下，由于存在额外的间接访问，使用索引的速度也可能较慢，并且始终比基于排序的解决方案要大，因为它除了原始集合外还需要索引空间。复杂度与 sort 相同。

trans-unit.source: Computes integer to floating point powers.
trans-unit.target: 计算整数到浮点幂。

trans-unit.source: Computes the cosine similarity of input ranges a and b. The two ranges must have the same length. If both ranges define length, the check is done once; otherwise, it is done at each iteration. If either range has all-zero elements, return 0.
trans-unit.target: 计算输入范围 a 和 b 的余弦相似度。两个范围必须具有相同的长度。如果两个范围都定义了长度，则检查一次。否则，将在每次迭代时完成。如果任一范围的元素全为零，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: Computes the dot product of input ranges a and b. The two ranges must have the same length. If both ranges define length, the check is done once; otherwise, it is done at each iteration.
trans-unit.target: 计算输入范围 a 和 b 的点积。两个范围必须具有相同的长度。如果两个范围都定义了长度，则检查一次。否则，将在每次迭代时完成。

trans-unit.source: Computes the Jensen-Shannon divergence between a and b, which is the sum (ai * log(2 * ai / (ai + bi)) + bi * log(2 * bi / (ai + bi))) / 2. The base of logarithm is 2. The ranges are assumed to contain elements in [0, 1]. Usually the ranges are normalized probability distributions, but this is not required or checked by jensenShannonDivergence. If the inputs are normalized, the result is bounded within [0, 1]. The three-parameter version stops evaluations as soon as the intermediate result is greater than or equal to limit.
trans-unit.target: 计算 a 和 b 之间的Jensen-Shannon散度，即和 (ai * log(2 * ai / (ai + bi)) + bi * log(2 * bi / (ai + bi))) / 2 。对数的底数为2。假定范围包含 [0, 1] 元素。通常，范围是归一化的概率分布，但是 jensenShannonDivergence 不需要或不能检查范围。如果将输入标准化，则结果将限制在 [0, 1] 。一旦中间结果大于或等于 limit ，则三参数版本将停止评估。

trans-unit.source: Computes the Kullback-Leibler divergence between input ranges a and b, which is the sum ai * log(ai / bi). The base of logarithm is 2. The ranges are assumed to contain elements in [0, 1]. Usually the ranges are normalized probability distributions, but this is not required or checked by kullbackLeiblerDivergence. If any element bi is zero and the corresponding element ai nonzero, returns infinity. (Otherwise, if ai == 0 && bi == 0, the term ai * log(ai / bi) is considered zero.) If the inputs are normalized, the result is positive.
trans-unit.target: 计算输入范围 a 和 b 之间的Kullback-Leibler散度，即和 ai * log(ai / bi) 。对数的底数为2。假定范围包含 [0, 1] 元素。通常，范围是归一化的概率分布，但这不是必需的，也不是由 kullbackLeiblerDivergence 检查。如果任何元素 bi 为零且相应元素 ai 为非零，则返回无穷大。 （否则，如果 ai == 0 && bi == 0 ，则将 ai * log(ai / bi) 视为零。）如果对输入进行了归一化，则结果为正。

trans-unit.source: Computes the greatest common divisor of a and b by using an efficient algorithm such as Euclid's or Stein's algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用有效的算法（例如Euclid或Stein算法）来计算 a 和 b 的最大公约数。

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash of the held value.
trans-unit.target: 计算持有值的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Computes the index of the first occurrence of range's maximum element.
trans-unit.target: 计算 range 的最大元素的第一次出现的索引。

trans-unit.source: Computes the index of the first occurrence of range's minimum element.
trans-unit.target: 计算 range 的最小元素的第一次出现的索引。

trans-unit.source: Computes the inverse Fourier transform of a range. The range must be a random access range with slicing, have a length equal to the size provided at construction of this object, and contain elements that are either of type std.complex.Complex or have essentially the same compile-time interface.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个范围的反傅立叶变换。范围必须是一个随机访问的分片范围,长度必须等于在构造此对象时提供的大小,并且包含的元素必须是std.complex.Complex类型或具有基本相同的编译时接口。

trans-unit.source: Computes the length of any range in O(n) time.
trans-unit.target: 用O(n)时间计算任意范围的长度。

trans-unit.source: Computes the length of grapheme cluster starting at index. Both the resulting length and the index are measured in code units.
trans-unit.target: 计算从 index 开始的字素簇的长度。结果长度和 index 均以代码单位进行度量。

trans-unit.source: Computes the match of the popFront length. Completes in Ο(s.length * t.length) time.
trans-unit.target: 计算popFront长度的匹配项。以 s.length * t.length （s.length * t.length）时间完成。

trans-unit.source: Computes the minimum (respectively maximum) of range along with its number of occurrences. Formally, the minimum is a value x in range such that pred(a, x) is false for all values a in range. Conversely, the maximum is a value x in range such that pred(x, a) is false for all values a in range (note the swapped arguments to pred).
trans-unit.target: 计算的最小（最大分别） range ，其出现次数的沿。形式上，最小值是一个值 x 在 range ，使得 pred(a, x) 是 false 对于所有的值 a 在 range 。相反，最大是一个值 x 在 range ，使得 pred(x, a) 是 false 对于所有的值 a 在 range （注意交换参数 pred ）。

trans-unit.source: Computes the next lexicographically greater even permutation of a range in-place.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个范围的下一个词法上的大偶数排列。

trans-unit.source: Computes the next lexicographically greater permutation of a range in-place.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个范围在原地的下一个词法上更大的排列组合。

trans-unit.source: Computes the nth permutation of a range in-place.
trans-unit.target: 就地计算一个范围的第n次排列。

trans-unit.source: Computes the union of a range of sorted ranges.
trans-unit.target: 计算排序范围的结合。

trans-unit.source: Computes the union of multiple ranges. The input ranges are passed as a range of ranges and each is assumed to be sorted by less. Computation is done lazily, one union element at a time. multiwayUnion(ror) is functionally equivalent to multiwayMerge(ror).uniq.
trans-unit.target: 计算多个范围的并集。的输入范围被作为一个范围的范围的传递，并且每个被假定为通过进行排序 less 。计算是懒惰的，一次只有一个并集元素。 multiwayUnion(ror) 在功能上等效于 multiwayMerge(ror).uniq 。

trans-unit.source: Computes the value of a positive integer x, raised to the power n, modulo m.
trans-unit.target: 计算以 n 为模的正整数 x 的值，以 m 为模。

trans-unit.source: Computes whether two values are approximately equal, admitting a maximum relative difference, and a maximum absolute difference.
trans-unit.target: 计算两个值是否近似相等,接纳最大相对差,和最大绝对差。

trans-unit.source: Computing array lengths during compilation
trans-unit.target: 编译过程中计算阵列长度

trans-unit.source: Concatenate Tuples. Tuple concatenation is only allowed if all named fields are distinct (no named field of this tuple occurs in t and no named field of t occurs in this tuple).
trans-unit.target: 连接元组。如果所有命名字段（在此发生元组没有命名的字段不同元组级联只允许 t 和不指定字段 t 在这个元组时）。

trans-unit.target: 连接多个 escapeShellCommand 和 escapeShellFileName 结果以使用Shell重定向或管道运算符。

trans-unit.target: 将路径段连在一起,形成一条路径。

trans-unit.target: 将两张清单连在一起(l2附在l1之后)。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates a range of ranges into one array.
trans-unit.target: 将一系列的范围连接成一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates several ranges into a single range.
trans-unit.target: 将几个范围合并成一个范围。

trans-unit.target: 在 arrs 内部连接数组。 _d_arraycatnTX([a, b, c]) 是指 a ~ b ~ c 。

trans-unit.source: Conditional logging can be achieved be passing a bool as first argument to a log function. If conditional logging is used the condition must be true in order to have the log message logged. In order to combine an explicit LogLevel passing with conditional logging, the LogLevel has to be passed as first argument followed by the bool.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 bool 作为第一个参数传递给log函数，可以实现条件记录。如果使用条件日志记录，则条件必须为 true 才能记录日志消息。为了将显式 LogLevel 与条件日志结合在一起，必须将 LogLevel 作为第一个参数传递，后跟 bool 。

trans-unit.source: Connection type used when the URL should be used to auto detect the protocol. This struct is used as placeholder for the connection parameter when calling the high level API and the connection type (HTTP/FTP) should be guessed by inspecting the URL parameter. The rules for guessing the protocol are: 1, if URL starts with ftp://, ftps:// or ftp. then FTP connection is assumed. 2, HTTP connection otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 当URL应该被用来自动检测协议时使用的连接类型。该结构在调用高层API时作为连接参数的占位符,应通过检查URL参数来猜测连接类型(HTTP/FTP)。猜测协议的规则是 1、如果URL以ftp://、ftps://或ftp开头,则假设为FTP连接。2,否则为HTTP连接。

trans-unit.source: Constructor for JSONValue. If arg is a JSONValue its value and type will be copied to the new JSONValue. Otherwise, arg must be implicitly convertible to one of the following types: typeof(null), string, ulong, long, double, an associative array V[K] for any V and K i.e. a JSON object, any array or bool. The type will be set accordingly.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a static array from a. The type of elements can be specified implicitly so that [1, 2].staticArray results in int[2], or explicitly, e.g. [1, 2].staticArray!float returns float[2]. When a is a range whose length is not known at compile time, the number of elements must be given as template argument (e.g. myrange.staticArray!2). Size and type can be combined, if the source range elements are implicitly convertible to the requested element type (eg: 2.iota.staticArray!(long[2])). When the range a is known at compile time, it can also be specified as a template argument to avoid having to specify the number of elements (e.g.: staticArray!(2.iota) or staticArray!(double, 2.iota)).
trans-unit.target: 构造从一个静态数组 a 。可以隐式指定元素的类型，以便 [1, 2].staticArray 产生 int[2] ，或显式地，例如 [1, 2].staticArray!float 返回 float[2] 。当 a 是在编译时长度未知的范围时，必须将元素的数目作为模板参数给出（例如 myrange.staticArray!2 ）。如果源范围元素可以隐式转换为请求的元素类型，则可以组合大小和类型（例如： 2.iota.staticArray!(long[2]) ）。当范围 a 在编译时是已知的，也可以将其指定为模板参数，以避免必须指定元素数（例如： staticArray!(2.iota) 或 staticArray!(double, 2.iota) ）。

trans-unit.target: 相反，所有的 out 合同都需要得到满足，因此覆盖功能成为

trans-unit.source: Conversely, allocating memory with one non-shared allocator, passing it across threads (by casting the obtained buffer to shared), and later deallocating it in a different thread (either with a different allocator object or with the same allocator object after casting it to shared) is illegal.
trans-unit.target: 相反，使用一个非 shared 分配器分配内存，将其在线程之间传递（通过将获得的缓冲区转换为 shared ），然后在不同的线程（使用不同的分配器对象或在将其转换为相同的分配器对象）之后将其释放 shared ）是非法的。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from integral types to floating-point types always succeed, but might lose accuracy. The largest integers with a predecessor representable in floating-point format are 2^24-1 for float, 2^53-1 for double, and 2^64-1 for real (when real is 80-bit, e.g. on Intel machines).
trans-unit.target: 从整数类型到浮点类型的转换始终会成功，但是可能会失去准确性。浮点格式可表示的前整数的最大整数是 2^24-1 对于 float )， 2^53-1 对于 double ）和 2^64-1 对于 real （当 real 为80位时，例如在Intel机器上） 。

trans-unit.source: Conversions from string to numeric types differ from the C equivalents atoi() and atol() by checking for overflow and not allowing whitespace.

trans-unit.source: Conversions operate transitively, meaning that they work on arrays and associative arrays of any complexity. This conversion works because to!short applies to an int, to!wstring applies to a string, to!string applies to a double, and to!(double[]) applies to an int[]. The conversion might throw an exception because to!short might fail the range check.
trans-unit.target: 转换是可传递的，这意味着它们可以处理任何复杂度的数组和关联数组。之所以这样进行转换，是因为 to!short 适用于 int ， to!wstring 适用于 string ， to!string 适用于 double ，并且 to!(double[]) 适用于 int[] 。转换可能会引发异常，因为 to!short 可能会使范围检查失败。

trans-unit.target: 转换为字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Convert types from one type to another.
trans-unit.target: 将类型从一种类型转换为另一种类型。

trans-unit.source: Converted to D from curl headers by htod and cleaned up by Jonas Drewsen (jdrewsen)
trans-unit.target: htod将其从卷曲头转换为D，并由Jonas Drewsen（jdrewsen）清理

trans-unit.source: Converting a value to its own type (useful mostly for generic code) simply returns its argument.
trans-unit.target: 将一个值转换为自己的类型(主要对通用代码有用),只需返回其参数即可。

trans-unit.source: Converting among numeric types is a safe way to cast them around. Conversions from floating-point types to integral types allow loss of precision (the fractional part of a floating-point number). The conversion is truncating towards zero, the same way a cast would truncate. (To round a floating point value when casting to an integral, use roundTo.)
trans-unit.target: 在数字类型之间进行转换是将其转换的安全方法。从浮点类型到整数类型的转换会导致精度损失（浮点数的小数部分）。转换将截断为零，与强制转换截断的方式相同。（要在转换为整数时舍入浮点值，请使用 roundTo 。）

trans-unit.source: Converting an array to another array type works by converting each element in turn. Associative arrays can be converted to associative arrays as long as keys and values can in turn be converted.
trans-unit.target: 将一个数组转换为另一种数组类型的工作原理是依次转换每个元素。只要键和值可以依次转换,就可以将关联数组转换为关联数组。

trans-unit.source: Converting text to any of the four normalization forms via normalize.
trans-unit.target: 通过 normalize 将文本转换为四种规范化形式中的任何一种。

trans-unit.source: Converts s to lowercase (by performing Unicode lowercase mapping) in place. For a few characters string length may increase after the transformation, in such a case the function reallocates exactly once. If s does not have any uppercase characters, then s is unaltered.
trans-unit.target: 将 s 转换为小写（通过执行Unicode小写映射）。对于几个字符，转换后字符串的长度可能会增加，在这种情况下，该函数将恰好重新分配一次。如果 s 没有任何大写字符，则 s 保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Converts s to uppercase (by performing Unicode uppercase mapping) in place. For a few characters string length may increase after the transformation, in such a case the function reallocates exactly once. If s does not have any lowercase characters, then s is unaltered.
trans-unit.target: 将 s 转换为大写（通过执行Unicode大写映射）。对于几个字符，转换后字符串的长度可能会增加，在这种情况下，该函数将恰好重新分配一次。如果 s 没有任何小写字符，则 s 不变。

trans-unit.source: Converts a SysTime to a FILETIME struct.
trans-unit.target: 将一 SysTime 到 FILETIME 结构。

trans-unit.source: Converts a SysTime to a SYSTEMTIME struct.
trans-unit.target: 一个转换 SysTime 到 SYSTEMTIME 结构。

trans-unit.source: Converts a FILETIME struct to a SysTime.
trans-unit.target: 将 FILETIME 结构转换为 SysTime 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a FILETIME struct to the number of hnsecs since midnight, January 1st, 1 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 将 FILETIME 结构转换为自公元1月1日午夜以来的hnsecs数

trans-unit.source: Converts a SYSTEMTIME struct to a SysTime.
trans-unit.target: 将 SYSTEMTIME 结构转换为 SysTime 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a TickDuration to the given units as either an integral value or a floating point value.
trans-unit.target: 将 TickDuration 转换为给定单位（整数值或浮点值）。

trans-unit.target: 将一个可调用转换为一个委托。

trans-unit.target: 在编译时将十六进制文字转换为字符串。

trans-unit.target: 将自公元1月1日午夜以来的多个hnsecs转换为 FILETIME 结构。

trans-unit.source: Converts an ASCII letter to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 将一个ASCII字母转换为小写字母。

trans-unit.source: Converts an ASCII letter to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 将一个ASCII字母转换为大写字母。

trans-unit.source: Converts any foreach-iterable entity (e.g. an input range) to an alias sequence.
trans-unit.target: 将任何foreach-iterable实体(例如输入范围)转换为别名序列。

trans-unit.source: Converts array (other than strings) to string. Each element is converted by calling to!T.
trans-unit.target: 将数组（字符串除外）转换为字符串。每个元素都通过调用 to!T 转换。

trans-unit.source: Converts from SysTime to DOS file date/time.
trans-unit.target: 从 SysTime 转换为DOS文件的日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts from DOS file date/time to SysTime.
trans-unit.target: 从DOS文件的日期/时间转换为 SysTime 。

trans-unit.source: Converts from unix time (i.e. seconds from midnight, January 1st, 1970 in UTC) to a SysTime.
trans-unit.target: 从unix时间（即，从UTC到1970年1月1日午夜开始的秒数）转换为 SysTime 。

trans-unit.source: Converts from unix time (which uses midnight, January 1st, 1970 UTC as its epoch and seconds as its units) to "std time" (which uses midnight, January 1st, 1 A.D. UTC and hnsecs as its units).
trans-unit.target: 将unix时间(以1970年1月1日午夜UTC为纪元,以秒为单位)转换为 "std时间"(以公元1月1日午夜UTC和hnsecs为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Converts std time (which uses midnight, January 1st, 1 A.D. UTC as its epoch and hnsecs as its units) to unix time (which uses midnight, January 1st, 1970 UTC as its epoch and seconds as its units).
trans-unit.target: 将std时间(以公元1月1日午夜的UTC为纪元,以hnsecs为单位)转换为unix时间(以1970年1月1日午夜的UTC为纪元,以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Converts the UTF-8 string s into a null-terminated string in a Windows 8-bit character set.
trans-unit.target: 将UTF-8字符串s转换为Windows 8位字符集中的空端字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the complex number to a string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将复数转换为字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given time from one clock frequency/resolution to another.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的时间从一种时钟频率/分辨率转换为另一种。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value from big endian to the native endianness and returns it. The value is given as a ubyte[n] where n is the size of the target type. You must give the target type as a template argument, because there are multiple types with the same size and so the type of the argument is not enough to determine the return type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的值从big endian转换为native endianness并返回它。该值以 ubyte[n] 形式给出，其中 n 是目标类型的大小。您必须将目标类型作为模板参数，因为存在多个具有相同大小的类型，因此参数的类型不足以确定返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value from little endian to the native endianness and returns it. The value is given as a ubyte[n] where n is the size of the target type. You must give the target type as a template argument, because there are multiple types with the same size and so the type of the argument is not enough to determine the return type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定值从little endian转换为native endianness并返回它。该值以 ubyte[n] 形式给出，其中 n 是目标类型的大小。您必须将目标类型作为模板参数，因为存在多个具有相同大小的类型，因此参数的类型不足以确定返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value from the native endianness to big endian and returns it as a ubyte[n] where n is the size of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定值从本机字节序转换为大字节序并将其返回为 ubyte[n] ，其中 n 是给定类型的大小。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value from the native endianness to little endian and returns it as a ubyte[n] where n is the size of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 将给定值从本机字节序转换为小字节序并将其返回为 ubyte[n] ，其中 n 是给定类型的大小。

trans-unit.source: Converts the null-terminated string s from a Windows 8-bit character set into a UTF-8 char array.
trans-unit.target: 将Windows 8位字符集中的空端字符串s转换为UTF-8字符数组。

trans-unit.source: Converts the store s into a heap. If initialSize is specified, only the first initialSize elements in s are transformed into a heap, after which the heap can grow up to r.length (if Store is a range) or indefinitely (if Store is a container with insertBack). Performs Ο(min(r.length, initialSize)) evaluations of less.
trans-unit.target: 转换店里 s 成一堆。如果 initialSize 被指定时，仅第一 initialSize 中的元素 s 被变换成一个堆，在此之后，堆可以长到 r.length （如果 Store 是一个范围）或无限期地（如果 Store 是与容器 insertBack ）。执行Ο（ min(r.length, initialSize) ）的评价 less 。

trans-unit.source: Converts this Date to a string with the format YYYY-MM-DD. If writer is set, the resulting string will be written directly to it.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Date 转换为格式 YYYY-MM-DD 的字符串。如果设置了 writer ，则结果字符串将直接写入其中。

trans-unit.source: Converts this Date to a string with the format YYYY-Mon-DD. If writer is set, the resulting string will be written directly to it.

trans-unit.source: Converts to string.
trans-unit.target: 转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Copies a range to another. If a = [1, 2, 3] and b = new int[5], then copy(a, b) leaves b = [1, 2, 3, 0, 0] and returns b[3 .. $].
trans-unit.target: 将范围复制到另一个。如果 a = [1, 2, 3] 和 b = new int[5] ，则 copy(a, b) 离开 b = [1, 2, 3, 0, 0] 并返回 b[3 .. $] 。

trans-unit.source: Copies all environment variables into an associative array.
trans-unit.target: 将所有环境变量复制到一个关联数组中。

trans-unit.source: Copies out the top elements of a range.
trans-unit.target: 复制出一个范围的顶部元素。

trans-unit.source: Copies out the values that occur most frequently (multiplied by per-value weights) in a range of ranges.
trans-unit.target: 复制出一个范围内出现频率最高的数值(乘以每个数值的权重)。

trans-unit.source: Copies out the values that occur most frequently in a range of ranges.
trans-unit.target: 复制出在一个范围内出现频率最高的数值。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of source into target and returns the remaining (unfilled) part of target.
trans-unit.target: 拷贝内容 source 到 target ，并返回的剩余的（未填充的）部分 target 。

trans-unit.source: Copies the top n elements of the input rangesource into the random-access range target, where n = target.length. Elements of source are not touched. If sorted is true, the target is sorted. Otherwise, the target respects the heap property.
trans-unit.target: 将输入范围 source 的前 n 个元素复制到随机访问范围 target 中，其中 n = target.length 。 source 元素没有被触及。如果 sorted 为 true ，则对目标进行排序。否则，目标将尊重heap属性。

trans-unit.target: 复制构造函数用于从另一个相同类型的 struct 初始化一个 struct 实例。

trans-unit.source: Copy file from to file to. File timestamps are preserved. File attributes are preserved, if preserve equals Yes.preserveAttributes. On Windows only Yes.preserveAttributes (the default on Windows) is supported. If the target file exists, it is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 将文件 from 复制到文件 to 。文件时间戳会保留。如果 preserve 等于 Yes.preserveAttributes ，则保留文件属性。在Windows上仅支持 Yes.preserveAttributes （Windows上的默认设置）。如果目标文件存在，则将其覆盖。

trans-unit.target: 复制初始化器的AST。

trans-unit.source: Copy the content of src into a C-string ('\0' terminated) then call dg
trans-unit.target: 将 src 的内容复制到C字符串（以'\ 0'终止）中，然后调用 dg

trans-unit.source: Copy the syntax. Used for template instantiations. If s is NULL, allocate the new object, otherwise fill it in.
trans-unit.target: 复制语法。用于模板实例化。如果s为NULL,则分配新对象,否则填入。

trans-unit.source: Copying of this struct is disabled, since it would provide no useful semantics. If you want to pass this struct around, you should do so by reference or pointer.
trans-unit.target: 这个结构的复制是被禁止的,因为它不会提供任何有用的语义。如果你想把这个结构传给别人,你应该通过引用或指针来实现。

trans-unit.source: Copying one File object to another results in the two File objects referring to the same underlying file.
trans-unit.target: 将一个 File 对象复制到另一个File对象将导致两个 File 对象引用同一基础文件。

trans-unit.target: 将范围 E 复制到 R 中。

trans-unit.source: Core allocator objects that interface with D's garbage collected heap (std.experimental.allocator.gc_allocator), the C malloc family (std.experimental.allocator.mallocator), and the OS (std.experimental.allocator.mmap_allocator). Most custom allocators would ultimately obtain memory from one of these core allocators.
trans-unit.target: 与D的垃圾收集堆（ std.experimental.allocator.gc_allocator ），C malloc 系列（ std.experimental.allocator.mallocator ）和OS（ std.experimental.allocator.mmap_allocator ）接口的核心分配器对象。大多数自定义分配器最终都会从这些核心分配器之一获取内存。

trans-unit.source: Core language definitions. Automatically imported.
trans-unit.target: 核心语言定义。自动导入。

trans-unit.source: Could not find an MX record for this domain but an A-record does exist
trans-unit.target: 找不到该域名的MX记录,但确实存在一个A记录。

trans-unit.source: Could not find an MX record or an A-record for this domain
trans-unit.target: 找不到该域名的MX记录或A记录。

trans-unit.source: Count The Number Of Rows Modified
trans-unit.target: 计算修改的行数

trans-unit.source: Count all the possible substrings of length 2
trans-unit.target: 计数所有可能的长度为2的子串。

trans-unit.source: Count up and return number of items in list.
trans-unit.target: 计算并返回列表中的项目数。

trans-unit.source: Counting Rod Numerals
trans-unit.target: 数杆数字

trans-unit.source: Counts all the set bits in the BitArray
trans-unit.target: 计算 BitArray 中的所有设置位

trans-unit.source: Counts elements in the given forward range until the given predicate is true for one of the given needles.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的计数元件前进范围，直到给定谓词是对于给定的一个真正的 needles 。

trans-unit.source: Counts elements that are equal to a specified value or satisfy a predicate. count([1, 2, 1], 1) returns 2 and count!"a < 0"([1, -3, 0]) returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 计算等于指定值或满足谓词的元素。 count([1, 2, 1], 1) 返回 2 ， count!"a < 0"([1, -3, 0]) 返回 1 。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to alignedAllocate that succeeded, i.e. they returned a block as large as requested. (N.B. requests for zero bytes count as successful.)
trans-unit.target: 计算成功调用 alignedAllocate 的调用数，即，它们返回了一个与请求一样大的块。（NB请求零字节视为成功。）

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to alignedAllocate. All calls are counted, including requests for zero bytes or failed requests.
trans-unit.target: 计算对 alignedAllocate 的调用次数。计算所有呼叫，包括零字节请求或失败请求。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to allocate that succeeded, i.e. they returned a block as large as requested. (N.B. requests for zero bytes count as successful.)
trans-unit.target: 计算成功进行 allocate 的调用次数，即，它们返回了一个与请求一样大的块。（NB请求零字节视为成功。）

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to allocate. All calls are counted, including requests for zero bytes or failed requests.
trans-unit.target: 计算要 allocate 的呼叫数。计算所有呼叫，包括零字节请求或失败请求。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to deallocate.
trans-unit.target: 计算要 deallocate 的调用次数。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to deallocateAll.
trans-unit.target: 计算对 deallocateAll 的调用次数。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to expand that resulted in a successful expansion.
trans-unit.target: 计数呼叫的数量来 expand ，导致一个成功的扩张。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to expand, regardless of arguments or result.
trans-unit.target: 计算 expand 的调用次数，无论参数或结果如何。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to owns.
trans-unit.target: 计算对自己 owns 的呼叫的数量。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to reallocate that resulted in an in-place reallocation (no memory moved). If this number is close to the total number of reallocations, that indicates the allocator finds room at the current block's end in a large fraction of the cases, but also that internal fragmentation may be high (the size of the unit of allocation is large compared to the typical allocation size of the application).
trans-unit.target: 计数调用的次数 reallocate ，导致就地重新分配（无记忆移动）。如果该数目接近于重新分配的总数，则表明分配器在大部分情况下在当前块的末端找到了空间，而且内部碎片可能很大（与之相比分配单元的大小很大）到应用程序的典型分配大小）。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to reallocate that succeeded. (Reallocations to zero bytes count as successful.)
trans-unit.target: 计算成功 reallocate 的调用数。（将零字节重新分配视为成功。）

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of calls to reallocate, regardless of arguments or result.
trans-unit.target: 计算要 reallocate 的调用数，而不考虑参数或结果。

trans-unit.source: Covariant means that 'this' can substitute for 't', i.e. a pure function is a match for an impure type.
trans-unit.target: Covariant意味着'this'可以代替't',即一个纯函数是一个不纯类型的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Covariant return types are supported, which means that the overriding function in a derived class can return a type that is derived from the type returned by the overridden function:
trans-unit.target: 支持共变返回类型,这意味着派生类中的覆盖函数可以返回一个由覆盖函数返回的类型派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: Coverage
trans-unit.target: Coverage

trans-unit.source: Covers a given range r in a random manner, i.e. goes through each element of r once and only once, just in a random order. r must be a random-access range with length.
trans-unit.target: 以随机的方式覆盖给定的范围 r ，即以随机顺序一次且仅一次遍历 r 的每个元素。 r 必须是具有长度的随机访问范围。

trans-unit.source: CppTypeInfo sti
trans-unit.target: CppTypeInfo sti

trans-unit.source: Create A New Dynamic String Object
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的动态字符串对象

trans-unit.source: Create Or Redefine SQL Functions
trans-unit.target: 创建或重新定义SQL函数

trans-unit.source: Create RTInfo for type T
trans-unit.target: 为类型T创建RTInfo

trans-unit.source: Create a KRRegion. If ParentAllocator is not NullAllocator, KRRegion's destructor will call parent.deallocate.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 KRRegion 。如果 ParentAllocator 不是 NullAllocator ，则 KRRegion 的析构函数将调用 parent.deallocate 。

trans-unit.source: Create a SocketSet with a specific initial capacity (defaults to FD_SETSIZE, the system's default capacity).
trans-unit.target: 创建具有特定初始容量（默认为 FD_SETSIZE ，系统的默认容量）的SocketSet 。

trans-unit.source: Create a bitfield pack of eight bits, which fit in one ubyte. The bitfields are allocated starting from the least significant bit, i.e. x occupies the two least significant bits of the bitfields storage.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个八位的位场包,可以容纳在一个ubyte中。位域从最不重要的位开始分配,即x占据位域存储的两个最不重要的位。

trans-unit.source: Create a blocking socket using the parameters from the specified AddressInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 AddressInfo 结构中的参数创建一个阻塞套接字。

trans-unit.source: Create a blocking socket. If a single protocol type exists to support this socket type within the address family, the ProtocolType may be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个阻止套接字。如果在地址族中存在支持该套接字类型的单个协议类型，则可以省略 ProtocolType 。

trans-unit.source: Create a deep copy of this
trans-unit.target: 创建的深层复制 this

trans-unit.source: Create a dynamic array of the same size and copy the contents of the array into it. The copy is typed as being immutable. If this conversion is invalid the call will not compile.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个相同大小的动态数组,并将数组的内容复制到其中。这个拷贝的类型是不可变的。如果这种转换是无效的,调用将无法编译。

trans-unit.source: Create a dynamic array of the same size and copy the contents of the array into it. The copy will have any immutability or const stripped. If this conversion is invalid the call will not compile.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个相同大小的动态数组,并将数组的内容复制到其中。复制的内容将有任何不可变性或const剥离。如果这种转换是无效的,调用将无法编译。

trans-unit.source: Create a horizontal rule by adding a line containing three or more asterisks, underscores or hyphens:
trans-unit.target: 通过添加包含三个或更多星号、下划线或连字符的行来创建一个水平规则。

trans-unit.source: Create a new associative array of the same size and copy the contents of the associative array into it.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个相同大小的新关联数组,并将关联数组的内容复制到其中。

trans-unit.source: Create a new scope from sc. semantic, semantic2 and semantic3 will use this for aggregate members.
trans-unit.target: semantic、semantic2和semantic3将使用它作为集合成员。

trans-unit.source: Create a new scope if one or more given attributes are different from the sc's. If the returned scope != sc, the caller should pop the scope after it used.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或多个给定属性与sc的属性不同,则创建一个新的作用域。如果返回的作用域 !=sc,调用者应该在它使用后弹出作用域。

trans-unit.source: Create a new thread for executing this Task, execute it in the newly created thread, then terminate the thread. This can be used for future/promise parallelism. An explicit priority may be given to the Task. If one is provided, its value is forwarded to core.thread.Thread.priority. See std.parallelism.task for usage example.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个用于执行此 Task 的新线程，在新创建的线程中执行它，然后终止该线程。这可以用于将来/承诺的并行性。可以给 Task 明确的优先级。如果提供了一个，则其值将转发到 core.thread.Thread.priority 。有关用法示例，请参见 std.parallelism.task 。

trans-unit.source: Create a quiet NAN, storing an integer inside the payload.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个安静的NAN,在有效载荷内存储一个整数。

trans-unit.source: Create a range which repeats one value.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个重复一个值的范围。

trans-unit.source: Create a reference to another dt.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个对另一个dt的引用。

trans-unit.source: Create a scope for the parameters of the TemplateInstance ti in the parent scope sc from the ScopeDsymbol paramsym.
trans-unit.target: 从ScopeDsymbol paramsym为父作用域sc 中的TemplateInstance ti 的参数创建一个作用域。

trans-unit.source: Create a thread not under control of the runtime, i.e. TLS module constructors are not run and the GC does not suspend it during a collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个不受运行时控制的线程,即TLS模块构造函数不运行,GC也不会在收集过程中暂停它。

trans-unit.source: Create a unary or binary function from a string. Most often used when defining algorithms on ranges.
trans-unit.target: 从一个字符串中创建一个单利或二进制函数。最常用于定义范围的算法。

trans-unit.source: Create a vector type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矢量类型。

trans-unit.source: Create an Fft object for computing fast Fourier transforms of power of two sizes of size or smaller. size must be a power of two.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 Fft 对象，以计算两个 size 或更小的大小的幂的快速傅里叶变换。 size 必须是2的幂。

trans-unit.source: Create an array of T with length elements using alloc. The array is either default-initialized, filled with copies of init, or initialized with values fetched from range.
trans-unit.target: 使用 alloc 创建一个带有 length 元素的 T 数组。该数组是默认初始化的，填充有 init 的副本，或者是使用从 range 获取的值初始化的。

trans-unit.source: Create an array of T with length elements. The array is either default-initialized, filled with copies of init, or initialized with values fetched from range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个带有 length 元素的 T 数组。该数组是默认初始化的，填充有 init 的副本，或者是使用从 range 获取的值初始化的。

trans-unit.source: Create an array of enumerated values
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举值的数组

trans-unit.source: Create an array of random numbers using range functions and UFCS
trans-unit.target: 使用范围函数和UFCS创建一个随机数组。

trans-unit.source: Create an identifier in the string table.
trans-unit.target: 在字符串表中创建一个标识符。

trans-unit.source: Create inclusive destructor for struct/class by aggregating all the destructors in dtors[] with the destructors for all the members.
trans-unit.target: 通过聚合dtors[]中的所有destructors和所有成员的destructors,为struct/class创建包容性的destructor。

trans-unit.source: Create inclusive invariant for struct/class by aggregating all the invariants in invs[]. void __invariant() const [pure nothrow @trusted] { invs[0](), invs[1](), ...; }
trans-unit.target: void __invariant()const [pure nothrow @trusted]{invs[0](),invs[1](),...;}。

trans-unit.source: Create instance of Object represented by 'this'.
trans-unit.target: 创建由'this'代表的Object实例。

trans-unit.source: Create instance of class specified by the fully qualified name classname. The class must either have no constructors or have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 创建由全称类名指定的类的实例。这个类必须没有构造函数或者有一个默认的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Create link to existing list, that is, share the list with somebody else.
trans-unit.target: 创建现有列表的链接,也就是与别人分享列表。

trans-unit.source: Create reference to s+offset
trans-unit.target: 创建对s+offset的引用

trans-unit.source: Create the static initializer for the struct/class.
trans-unit.target: 为结构/类创建静态初始化器。

trans-unit.source: CreateFolder createFileNameFolder
trans-unit.target: CreateFolder createFileNameFolder

trans-unit.source: Creates a Date from a string with the format YYYY-MM-DD. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 根据格式为YYYY-MM-DD的字符串创建 Date 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Date from a string with the format YYYY-Mon-DD. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 根据格式为YYYY-Mon-DD的字符串创建 Date 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Date from a string with the format YYYYMMDD. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 根据格式为YYYYMMDD的字符串创建 Date 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DateTime from a string with the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为YYYY-MM-DDTHH：MM：SS的字符串创建 DateTime 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DateTime from a string with the format YYYY-Mon-DD HH:MM:SS. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为YYYY-Mon-DD HH：MM：SS的字符串创建 DateTime 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a DateTime from a string with the format YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS的字符串创建 DateTime 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a SysTime from a string with the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.FFFFFFFTZ (where F is fractional seconds is the time zone). Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 创建 SysTime 从与格式YYYY-MM-DD HH的字符串：MM：SS.FFFFFFFTZ（其中F是小数秒是时区）。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a SysTime from a string with the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.FFFFFFFTZ (where F is fractional seconds is the time zone). Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 创建 SysTime 从与格式YYYY-MM-DDTHH的字符串：MM：SS.FFFFFFFTZ（其中F是小数秒是时区）。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a SysTime from a string with the format YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS.FFFFFFFTZ (where F is fractional seconds is the time zone). Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS.FFFFFFFTZ的字符串创建 SysTime （其中F是小数秒是时区）。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a TimeOfDay from a string with the format HH:MM:SS. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为HH：MM：SS的字符串创建 TimeOfDay 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a TimeOfDay from a string with the format HHMMSS. Whitespace is stripped from the given string.
trans-unit.target: 从格式为HHMMSS的字符串创建 TimeOfDay 。从给定的字符串中去除了空格。

trans-unit.source: Creates a BitArray from a bool array, such that bool values read from left to right correspond to subsequent bits in the BitArray.
trans-unit.target: 从 bool 数组创建一个 BitArray ，以便从左到右读取的 bool 值对应于 BitArray 中的后续位。

trans-unit.source: Creates a BitArray from the raw contents of the source array. The source array is not copied but simply acts as the underlying array of bits, which stores data as size_t units.
trans-unit.target: 根据源数组的原始内容创建一个 BitArray 。源数组不会被复制，而只是充当基础位数组，将数据存储为 size_t 单位。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Task on the GC heap that calls a function pointer, delegate, or class/struct with overloaded opCall.
trans-unit.target: 在GC堆上创建一个 Task ，该任务使用重载的opCall调用函数指针，委托或类/结构。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Task on the GC heap that calls an alias. This may be executed via Task.executeInNewThread or by submitting to a std.parallelism.TaskPool. A globally accessible instance of TaskPool is provided by std.parallelism.taskPool.
trans-unit.target: 在GC堆上创建一个调用别名的 Task 。这可以通过 Task.executeInNewThread 或提交给 std.parallelism.TaskPool 来执行。 TaskPool 提供了 std.parallelism.taskPool 可全局访问的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Condition variable analog for signaling.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个条件变量模拟信号。

trans-unit.source: Creates a Lexer for the source code base[begoffset..endoffset+1]. The last character, base[endoffset], must be null (0) or EOF (0x1A).
trans-unit.target: 为源代码 base[begoffset...endoffset+1]创建一个 Lexer。最后一个字符base[endoffset]必须为空(0)或EOF(0x1A)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a bitfield pack of eight bits, which fit in one ubyte. The bitfields are allocated starting from the least significant bit, i.e. x occupies the two least significant bits of the bitfields storage.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个八位的位字段包，它们适合一个 ubyte 。从最低有效位开始分配位域，即x占用位域存储的两个最低有效位。

trans-unit.source: Creates a container of type C from either another container or a range. The created container must not be a null reference even if x is empty.
trans-unit.target: 从另一个容器或范围创建一个类型为 C 的容器。即使x为空，创建的容器也不能为null引用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of a Tuple with its fields in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个具有相反字段的 Tuple 副本。

trans-unit.source: Creates a forward range whose values are defined by a mathematical recurrence relation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个正向范围,其值由一个数学递归关系定义。

trans-unit.source: Creates a function that binds the first argument of a given function to a given value.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个函数,将给定函数的第一个参数与给定值绑定。

trans-unit.source: Creates a function that caches its result for fast re-evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个缓存其结果的函数,以便快速重新评估。

trans-unit.source: Creates a function that negates another.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个否定另一个函数的函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash of this Tuple.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 Tuple 的哈希。

trans-unit.source: Creates a mathematical sequence given the initial values and a recurrence function that computes the next value from the existing values. The sequence comes in the form of an infinite forward range. The type Recurrence itself is seldom used directly; most often, recurrences are obtained by calling the function recurrence.
trans-unit.target: 创建给定初始值的数学序列和递归函数，该递归函数根据现有值计算下一个值。该序列以无限向前范围的形式出现。 Recurrence 类型本身很少直接使用；通常，通过调用函数 recurrence 获得重现。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Condition variable analog which is used to check for and to signal the addition of messages to a thread's message queue. Like yield, some schedulers may need to define custom behavior so that calls to Condition.wait() yield to another thread when no new messages are available instead of blocking.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的Condition变量类比值,用于检查消息并向线程的消息队列发出添加消息的信号。和yield一样,一些调度器可能需要定义自定义行为,以便在没有新消息时,调用Condition.wait()会让位于另一个线程,而不是阻塞。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new Condition variable. No custom behavior is needed here.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的Condition变量。这里不需要自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new array out of several copies of an input array or range.
trans-unit.target: 从一个输入数组或范围的多个副本中创建一个新的数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new array such that the items in slice are replaced with the items in replacement. slice and replacement do not need to be the same length. The result will grow or shrink based on the items given.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新数组，使 slice 中的项目 replacement 为replace中的项目。 slice 和 replacement 的长度不必相同。结果将根据给定的项目而增大或缩小。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new array which is identical to s except that all of its characters are converted to lowercase (by preforming Unicode lowercase mapping). If none of s characters were affected, then s itself is returned if s is a string-like type.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个与 s 相同的新数组，不同之处在于其所有字符均转换为小写（通过执行Unicode小写映射）。如果 s 个字符均未受影响，则如果 s 是类似 string 的类型，则返回 s 本身。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new curl session handle with the same options set for the handle passed in. Duplicating a handle could only be a matter of cloning data and options, internal state info and things like persistant connections cannot be transfered. It is useful in multithreaded applications when you can run curl_easy_duphandle() for each new thread to avoid a series of identical curl_easy_setopt() invokes in every thread.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的curl会话句柄,并为传入的句柄设置相同的选项。复制一个句柄只能是克隆数据和选项的问题,内部状态信息和持久连接之类的东西不能被传输。在多线程应用中,当你可以为每个新线程运行curl_easy_duphandle()以避免在每个线程中调用一系列相同的curl_easy_setopt()时,它是很有用的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new function call expression
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的函数调用表达式

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of Error. The nextInChain parameter is used internally and should always be null when passed by user code. This constructor does not automatically throw the newly-created Error; the throw statement should be used for that purpose.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个错误的新实例。nextInChain参数在内部使用，并在由用户代码传递时始终为 null 。该构造函数不会自动引发新创建的错误；该 throw 声明应被用于此目的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of Exception. The nextInChain parameter is used internally and should always be null when passed by user code. This constructor does not automatically throw the newly-created Exception; the throw statement should be used for that purpose.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的Exception实例。nextInChain参数在内部使用，并在由用户代码传递时始终为 null 。该构造函数不会自动引发新创建的Exception；该 throw 声明应被用于此目的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new kernel thread and assigns it to run the supplied op.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的内核线程,并将其分配给运行提供的操作。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new static array from given data.
trans-unit.target: 从给定数据中创建一个新的静态数组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a pair of connected sockets.
trans-unit.target: 创建一对连接的插座。

trans-unit.source: Creates a proxy for the value a that will forward all operations while disabling implicit conversions. The aliased item a must be an lvalue. This is useful for creating a new type from the "base" type (though this is not a subtype-supertype relationship; the new type is not related to the old type in any way, by design).
trans-unit.target: 为值 a 创建一个代理，该代理将在禁用隐式转换的同时转发所有操作。别名项 a 必须是左值。这对于从“基本”类型创建新类型很有用（尽管这不是子类型与超类型的关系；通过设计，新类型无论如何都不与旧类型相关）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a random-access range consisting of exactly the first element of the given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个随机访问范围,正好由给定范围的第一个元素组成。

trans-unit.source: Creates a random-access range consisting of zero elements of the given range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个由给定范围的零元素组成的随机访问范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range by successive calls to a given function. This allows to create ranges as a single delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通过连续调用给定函数来创建一个范围。这允许以单个委托的方式创建范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range consisting of numbers between a starting point and ending point, spaced apart by a given interval.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个由起点和终点之间的数字组成的范围,并按照给定的间隔进行间隔。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range of values that span the given starting and stopping values.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个跨越给定起始值和停止值的数值范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that consists of a single element repeated
trans-unit.target: 创建一个由单个元素重复组成的范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that iterates over the
trans-unit.target: 创建一个迭代于

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that iterates over the first elements of the given ranges.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个迭代给定范围的第一个元素的范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that iterates over the given arguments.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个在给定参数上迭代的范围。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that offers a view of a given range as though its elements were reordered according to a given range of indices.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个范围,提供一个给定范围的视图,好像它的元素是根据给定的指数范围重新排序的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that returns a fixed-size sliding window over the original range. Unlike chunks, it advances a configurable number of items at a time, not one chunk at a time.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个范围,在原范围上返回一个固定大小的滑动窗口。与分块不同的是,它每次推进的是可配置数量的项目,而不是一次推进一个分块。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that returns a number of chunks of approximately equal length from the original range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个范围,从原始范围中返回一些长度大致相等的块。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that returns fixed-size chunks of the original range.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个范围,返回原始范围的固定大小的块。

trans-unit.source: Creates a range that wraps a given range, forwarding along its elements while also calling a provided function with each element.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个包裹给定范围的范围,沿着它的元素转发,同时也对每个元素调用一个提供的函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates a scalable AllocatorList of Regions, each having at least bytesPerRegion bytes. Allocation is very fast. trans-unit.source: D can easily call C callbacks (function pointers), and C can call callbacks provided by D code if the callback is an extern(C) function, or some other linkage that both sides have agreed to (e.g. extern(Windows)).

trans-unit.source: D can explicitly manage memory using a variety of library tools, such as with std.experimental.allocator. Additionally, core.stdc.stdlib.malloc and core.stdc.stdlib.free can be used directly for connecting to C++ functions that expect malloc'd buffers.

trans-unit.source: D can still explicitly allocate memory using core.stdc.stdlib.malloc() and core.stdc.stdlib.free(), these are useful for connecting to C functions that expect malloc'd buffers, etc.
trans-unit.target: D仍然可以使用core.stdc.stlib.malloc()和core.stdc.stlib.free()显式分配内存,这些对于连接到期望malloc'd缓冲区的C函数等很有用。

trans-unit.source: D cannot directly call C++ special member functions, and vice versa. These include constructors, destructors, conversion operators, operator overloading, and allocators.
trans-unit.target: D不能直接调用C++的特殊成员函数,反之亦然。这些函数包括构造函数、破坏函数、转换运算符、运算符重载和分配器。

trans-unit.source: D does not support bit fields. If needed, they can be emulated with shift and mask operations, or use the std.bitmanip.bitfields library type. htod will convert bit fields to inline functions that do the right shift and masks.
trans-unit.target: D不支持位字段。如果需要，可以使用移位和掩码操作来模拟它们，或者使用std.bitmanip.bitfields库类型。htod会将位字段转换为可进行正确移位和掩码的内联函数。

trans-unit.source: D does not support declaring variables of anonymous struct types. In such a case you can define a named struct in D and make it private:
trans-unit.target: D不支持声明匿名结构类型的变量。在这种情况下,你可以在D中定义一个命名的结构,并使其成为私有结构。

trans-unit.source: D exception handling fits right in with that.
trans-unit.target: D异常处理正好符合这一点。

trans-unit.target: BetterC无法提供的D功能：

trans-unit.source: D grammar allows declarations only as statements. However in AST representation it can be part of any expression. This is used, for example, during internal syntax re-writes to inject hidden symbols.
trans-unit.target: D语法只允许声明作为语句。然而在AST表示中,它可以成为任何表达式的一部分。例如,在内部语法重写过程中,就会用到这一点,以注入隐藏的符号。

trans-unit.source: D has reference types, but they are implicit. For example, classes are always referred to by reference; this means that class instances can never reside on the stack or be passed as function parameters.
trans-unit.target: D有引用类型,但它们是隐式的。例如,类总是通过引用来引用;这意味着类实例永远不能驻留在堆栈上或作为函数参数传递。

trans-unit.source: D has some support for interfacing with Objective-C. It supports classes, subclasses, instance variables, instance and class methods. It is only available on macOS, compiling for 64bit.
trans-unit.target: D对与Objective-C的接口有一定的支持,它支持类、子类、实例变量、实例和类方法。它支持类、子类、实例变量、实例和类方法。它只在macOS上提供,编译为64位。

trans-unit.source: D has types that are not represented in existing C or C++ debuggers. These are dynamic arrays, associative arrays, and delegates. Representing these types as structs causes problems because function calling conventions for structs are often different than that for these types, which causes C/C++ debuggers to misrepresent things. For these debuggers, they are represented as a C type which does match the calling conventions for the type. The dmd compiler will generate only C symbolic type info with the -gc compiler switch.
trans-unit.target: D具有现有C或C ++调试器中未表示的类型。这些是动态数组，关联数组和委托。将这些类型表示为结构会导致问题，因为结构的函数调用约定通常不同于这些类型的函数调用约定，这会导致C / C ++调试器错误地表示事物。对于这些调试器，它们表示为与该类型的调用约定匹配的C类型。该DMD编译器将生成的是仅含有C象征型信息-gc编译器开关。

trans-unit.source: D is a general-purpose systems programming language with a C-like syntax that compiles to native code. It is statically typed and supports both automatic (garbage collected) and manual memory management. D programs are structured as modules that can be compiled separately and linked with external libraries to create native libraries or executables.
trans-unit.target: D是一种通用的系统编程语言,具有类似于C的语法,可以编译成本地代码,它是静态类型的,支持自动(垃圾回收)和手动内存管理。它是静态类型的,支持自动(垃圾回收)和手动内存管理。D程序的结构为模块,可以单独编译,并与外部库链接,创建本地库或可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: D is a systems programming language with support for garbage collection. Usually it is not necessary to free memory explicitly. Just allocate as needed, and the garbage collector will periodically return all unused memory to the pool of available memory.
trans-unit.target: D是一种系统编程语言,支持垃圾回收。通常情况下,不需要显式地释放内存。只需要根据需要进行分配,垃圾收集器会定期将所有未使用的内存返回到可用内存池中。

trans-unit.source: D is designed to fit comfortably with a C compiler for the target system. D makes up for not having its own VM by relying on the target environment's C runtime library. It would be senseless to attempt to port to D or write D wrappers for the vast array of C APIs available. How much easier it is to just call them directly.
trans-unit.target: D的设计是为了与目标系统的C编译器相适应。D通过依赖目标环境的C运行时库来弥补自己没有虚拟机的缺陷。如果试图将大量的C API移植到D,或者为其编写D包装器,那是毫无意义的。直接调用它们要容易得多。

trans-unit.source: D is statically typed. Every expression has a type. Types constrain the values an expression can hold, and determine the semantics of operations on those values.
trans-unit.target: D是静态类型的。每个表达式都有一个类型。类型限制了一个表达式可以持有的值,并决定了对这些值进行操作的语义。

trans-unit.source: D language counterpart to C++ std::array.
trans-unit.target: D语言对应于C++std::array。

trans-unit.target: D语言对应于C++std::basic_string。

trans-unit.source: D makes this simple. All member initializations must be determinable by the compiler at compile time, hence there is no order-of-evaluation dependency for member initializations, and it is not possible to read a value that has not been initialized. Dynamic initialization is performed by a static constructor, defined with a special syntax static this().
trans-unit.target: D使这个变得简单。所有成员初始化都必须由编译器在编译时确定，因此成员初始化没有评估顺序的依赖关系，并且不可能读取尚未初始化的值。动态初始化由静态构造函数执行，该静态构造函数使用特殊语法 static this() 定义。

trans-unit.source: D provides an easy way to call C functions and operating system API functions, as compatibility with both is essential. The
trans-unit.target: D提供了一种简单的方法来调用C函数和操作系统API函数,因为两者的兼容性是必不可少的。在这里,我想说的是,D语言提供了一个简单的方法来调用C函数和操作系统的API函数,因为两者的兼容性是必不可少的。

trans-unit.source: D runtime type identification uses completely different techniques than C++. The two are incompatible.
trans-unit.target: D运行时类型识别使用的技术与C++完全不同。两者是不兼容的。

trans-unit.source: D structs and classes have different semantics whereas C++ structs and classes are basically the same. The use of a D struct or class depends on the C++ implementation and not on the used C++ keyword. When mapping a D class onto a C++ struct, use extern(C++, struct) to avoid linking problems with C++ compilers (notably MSVC) that distinguish between C++'s class and struct when mangling. Conversely, use extern(C++, class) to map a D struct onto a C++ class.
trans-unit.target: D结构和类具有不同的语义，而C ++结构和类基本上相同。D结构或类的使用取决于C ++实现，而不取决于所使用的C ++关键字。将D class 映射到C ++ struct ，请使用 extern(C++, struct) 避免与C ++编译器（尤其是MSVC）链接时发生链接问题，该问题可在处理时区分C ++的 class 和 struct 。相反，使用 extern(C++, class) 将D struct 映射到C ++ class 。

trans-unit.source: Ddoc can automatically generate usage examples for declarations using unit tests. If a declaration is followed by a documented unit test, the code from the test will be inserted into the example section of the declaration. This avoids the frequent problem of having outdated documentation for pieces of code.
trans-unit.target: Ddoc可以使用单元测试为声明自动生成使用示例。如果一个声明后面有一个文档化的单元测试,那么测试中的代码将被插入到声明的示例部分。这就避免了经常出现的代码文档过时的问题。

trans-unit.source: Ddoc does not generate HTML code. It formats into the basic formatting macros, which (in their predefined form) are then expanded into HTML. If output other than HTML is desired, then these macros need to be redefined.
trans-unit.target: Ddoc不生成HTML代码。它将格式化为基本的格式化宏,然后(以其预定义的形式)扩展为HTML。如果需要HTML以外的输出,则需要重新定义这些宏。

trans-unit.source: Ddoc is primarily designed for use in producing documentation from embedded comments. It can also, however, be used for processing other general documentation. The reason for doing this would be to take advantage of the macro capability of Ddoc and the D code syntax highlighting capability.
trans-unit.target: Ddoc主要是设计用来从嵌入的注释制作文档。不过,它也可以用来处理其他一般的文档。这样做的原因是为了利用Ddoc的宏功能和D代码语法高亮功能。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates b, which is assumed to have been previously allocated with this allocator. Deallocation performs a linear search in the free list to preserve its sorting order. It follows that blocks with higher addresses in allocators with many free blocks are slower to deallocate.
trans-unit.target: 取消分配 b ，假定b先前已使用此分配器分配。取消分配在空闲列表中执行线性搜索以保留其排序顺序。因此，具有许多空闲块的分配器中具有较高地址的块的释放速度较慢。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates b.
trans-unit.target: 解除分配 b 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates b. If it's of eligible size, it's put on the free list. Otherwise, it's returned to parent.
trans-unit.target: 解除分配 b 。如果大小符合条件，则将其列入免费列表。否则，它将返回给 parent 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates b. This works only if b was obtained as the last call to allocate; otherwise (i.e. another allocation has occurred since) it does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 解除分配 b 。仅当获得 b 作为最后的 allocate 调用时，此方法才有效；否则（即发生了另一个分配），它什么也不做。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates b. This works only if b was obtained as the last call to allocate; otherwise (i.e. another allocation has occurred since) it does nothing. This semantics is tricky and therefore deallocate is defined only if Region is instantiated with Yes.defineDeallocate as the third template argument.
trans-unit.target: 解除分配 b 。仅当获得 b 作为最后的 allocate 调用时，此方法才有效；否则（即发生了另一个分配），它什么也不做。此语义很棘手，因此，仅当使用 Yes.defineDeallocate 作为第三个模板参数实例化 Region 时,才定义 deallocate 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates a block previously allocated with this allocator.
trans-unit.target: 重新分配之前用这个分配器分配的块。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates a memory block. Implementations that don't support this primitive should always return false. A simple way to check that an allocator supports deallocation is to call deallocate(null).
trans-unit.target: 取消分配内存块。不支持该原语的实现应始终返回 false 。检查分配器是否支持取消分配的一种简单方法是调用 deallocate(null) 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory allocated by this region, which can be subsequently reused for new allocations.
trans-unit.target: 取消分配该区域分配的所有内存,该内存可随后重新用于新的分配。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory allocated with this allocator.
trans-unit.target: 删除分配器分配的所有内存。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory allocated with this allocator. If an allocator implements this method, it must specify whether its destructor calls it, too.
trans-unit.target: 删除分配器分配的所有内存。如果一个分配器实现了这个方法,它必须指定它的破坏者是否也调用它。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory allocated.
trans-unit.target: 删除分配的所有内存。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory currently allocated, making the allocator ready for other allocations. This is a Ο(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消分配当前已分配的所有内存，使分配器准备好进行其他分配。这是Ο（ 1 ）操作。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates all memory. Implementations that don't support this primitive should always return false.
trans-unit.target: 取消分配所有内存。不支持该原语的实现应始终返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates everything from the parent.
trans-unit.target: 从父节点分配一切。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates the buffer b given as parameter. Deallocations take place in constant time, regardless of the number of nodes in the list. b.ptr is rounded down to the nearest multiple of the alignment to quickly find the corresponding AlignedBlockNode.
trans-unit.target: 取消分配作为参数给定的缓冲区 b 。不管列表中有多少节点，重新分配都会在恒定时间内进行。 b.ptr 是四舍五入到最接近的倍数 alignment 迅速找到相应的 AlignedBlockNode 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates the given buffer b, by atomically setting the corresponding bit to 0. b must be valid, and cannot contain multiple adjacent blocks.
trans-unit.target: 通过原子地将相应位设置为 0 来取消分配给定的缓冲区 b 。 b 必须有效，并且不能包含多个相邻的 blocks 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocates the memory referenced by p. If p is null, no action occurs. If p references memory not originally allocated by this garbage collector, if p points to the interior of a memory block, or if this method is called from a finalizer, no action will be taken. The block will not be finalized regardless of whether the FINALIZE attribute is set. If finalization is desired, call destroy prior to GC.free.
trans-unit.target: 释放由p引用的内存。如果p为null，则不执行任何操作。如果p引用了此垃圾回收器最初未分配的内存，或者p指向内存块的内部，或者从终结器调用了此方法，则将不执行任何操作。无论是否设置了FINALIZE属性，都不会最终确定该块。如果需要完成，请在 GC.free 之前调用 destroy 。

trans-unit.source: Deallocation removes any read/write permissions from the target pages and notifies the OS to reclaim the physical memory, while keeping the virtual memory.
trans-unit.target: Deallocation 删除目标页面的任何读/写权限,并通知操作系统收回物理内存,同时保留虚拟内存。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a single code point from the end of a string.

trans-unit.source: Decodes a single code point.

trans-unit.source: Decodes a single code point. The input does not have to be valid.
trans-unit.target: 对单个码点进行解码。输入不一定是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a string by unescaping all predefined XML entities.

trans-unit.source: Decodes and returns the code point starting at str[index]. index is advanced to one past the decoded code point. If the code point is not well-formed, then a UTFException is thrown and index remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 解码并返回从 str[index] 开始的代码点。 index 被提前到解码代码点之后的一个。如果代码点的格式不正确，则将引发 UTFException 且 index 保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Decodes source into a given output range.
trans-unit.target: 将源解码为给定的输出范围。

trans-unit.source: Decodes source into newly-allocated buffer.
trans-unit.target: 将源码解码到新分配的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Decodes source into the given buffer.
trans-unit.target: 将源码解码到给定的缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the URI string encodedURI into a UTF-8 string and returns it. All escape sequences are decoded.
trans-unit.target: 将URI字符串encodedURI解码为UTF-8字符串并返回。所有的转义序列都被解码。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the URI string encodedURI into a UTF-8 string and returns it. Escape sequences that resolve to reserved URI characters are not replaced. Escape sequences that resolve to the '#' character are not replaced.
trans-unit.target: 将URI字符串encodedURI解码为UTF-8字符串并返回。不替换解析为保留URI字符的转义序列。解析为'#'字符的转义序列不会被替换。

trans-unit.source: Decoding (decodeGrapheme) and iteration (byGrapheme, graphemeStride) by user-perceived characters, that is by Grapheme clusters.
trans-unit.target: 解码（ decodeGrapheme ）和迭代（ byGrapheme ， graphemeStride 由用户感知的字符），也就是由 Grapheme 簇。

trans-unit.source: Decommit all physical memory associated with the buffer given as parameter, but keep the range of virtual addresses.
trans-unit.target: 解除与缓冲区相关联的所有物理内存,但保留虚拟地址的范围。

trans-unit.target: Decompose

trans-unit.source: Decomposes a Hangul syllable. If ch is not a composed syllable then this function returns Grapheme containing only ch as is.
trans-unit.target: 分解韩文音节。如果 ch 不是组成的音节，则此函数将按原样返回仅包含 ch 的 Grapheme 。

trans-unit.source: Decomposing and composing of individual character(s) according to canonical or compatibility rules, see compose and decompose, including the specific version for Hangul syllables composeJamo and decomposeHangul.
trans-unit.target: 根据规范或兼容性规则来分解和组成单个字符，请参阅 compose 和 decompose ，包括Hangul音节的特定版本 composeJamo 和 decomposeHangul 。

trans-unit.source: Decompress and return any remaining data. The returned data should be appended to that returned by uncompress(). The UnCompress object cannot be used further.
trans-unit.target: 解压并返回任何剩余数据。返回的数据应该附加到uncompress()返回的数据上。UnCompress对象不能继续使用。

trans-unit.source: Decompress the contents of archive member de and return the expanded data.
trans-unit.target: 解压存档成员de的内容,并返回扩展数据。

trans-unit.source: Decompress the data in buf and return the decompressed data. The buffers returned from successive calls to this should be concatenated together.
trans-unit.target: 解压buf中的数据并返回解压后的数据。连续调用这个函数返回的缓冲区应该是连在一起的。

trans-unit.source: Decompresses the data in srcbuf[].
trans-unit.target: 解压 srcbuf[]中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Decreases the reference count of the concrete class that implements this interface. When the reference count is 0, the object self-destructs.
trans-unit.target: 减少实现此接口的具体类的引用计数。当引用计数为 0 时，对象将自毁。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the internal lock count by one. If this brings the count to zero, the lock is released.
trans-unit.target: 将内部锁的数量减少1。如果这样做使计数为零,则锁被释放。

trans-unit.source: Deduction from a specialization can provide values for more than one parameter:
trans-unit.target: 从特殊化的演绎中可以提供多个参数的值。

trans-unit.target: 深度接口继承会导致出现诸如“错误：函数std.typecons.AutoImplement！（Foo）.AutoImplement.bar不覆盖任何函数”之类的消息的编译错误。[ Bugzilla 2525 ]

trans-unit.source: Defaults to "" but can be assigned to prior to calling getopt.
trans-unit.target: 默认为“”，但可以在调用 getopt 之前将其分配给。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to "--" but can be assigned to prior to calling getopt. Assigning an empty string to endOfOptions effectively disables it.
trans-unit.target: 默认为“-”，但是可以在调用 getopt 之前分配给它。将空字符串分配给 endOfOptions 可以有效地禁用它。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to Yes.preserveAttributes on Windows, and the opposite on all other platforms.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows上默认为 Yes.preserveAttributes ，在所有其他平台上则相反。

trans-unit.source: Define XorshiftEngine generators with well-chosen parameters. See each bits examples of "Xorshift RNGs". Xorshift is a Xorshift128's alias because 128bits implementation is mostly used.
trans-unit.target: 使用精心选择的参数定义 XorshiftEngine 生成器。请参见“ Xorshift RNG”的每个位示例。 Xorshift 是Xorshift128的别名，因为大多数使用128位实现。

trans-unit.source: Define LinearCongruentialEngine generators with well-chosen parameters. MinstdRand0 implements Park and Miller's "minimal standard" generator that uses 16807 for the multiplier. MinstdRand implements a variant that has slightly better spectral behavior by using the multiplier 48271. Both generators are rather simplistic.
trans-unit.target: 使用精心选择的参数定义LinearCongruentialEngine生成器。 MinstdRand0 实现了Park和Miller的“最小标准” 生成器，该生成器使用16807作为乘数。 MinstdRand 通过使用乘法器48271实现了一种具有稍微更好的光谱性能的变量。两个发生器都相当简单。

trans-unit.target: 定义同步异常的基类。

trans-unit.target: 在建立标准库时定义

trans-unit.source: Defined if Allocator.deallocate and Allocator.owns are defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 Allocator.deallocate 和 Allocator.owns ,则定义。

trans-unit.source: Defined if ParentAllocator.deallocate exists and forwards to parent.deallocate(b.ptr[0 .. goodAllocSize(b.length)]).
trans-unit.target: 定义是否存在 ParentAllocator.deallocate 并转发到 parent.deallocate(b.ptr[0 .. goodAllocSize(b.length)]) 。

trans-unit.source: Defined if ParentAllocator.deallocate exists, and returns to it all memory held in the free tree.
trans-unit.target: 定义 ParentAllocator.deallocate 是否存在，并将空闲树中保留的所有内存返回给它。

trans-unit.source: Defined if ParentAllocator.deallocateAll exists, and forwards to it. Also nullifies the free tree (it's assumed the parent frees all memory stil managed by the free tree).
trans-unit.target: 定义 ParentAllocator.deallocateAll 是否存在并转发给它。也使空闲树无效（假定父级释放了由空闲树管理的所有内存Stil）。

trans-unit.source: Defined if ParentAllocator defines it. Checks whether the block belongs to this allocator.
trans-unit.target: 定义是否由 ParentAllocator 定义。检查该块是否属于此分配器。

trans-unit.source: Defined if perCallFlags is nonzero.
trans-unit.target: 定义 perCallFlags 是否为非零。

trans-unit.source: Defined if perCallFlags is nonzero. Iterates all monitored file/line instances. The order of iteration is not meaningful (items are inserted at the front of a list upon the first call), so preprocessing the statistics after collection might be appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 定义 perCallFlags 是否为非零。迭代所有受监视的文件/行实例。迭代的顺序没有意义（在第一次调用时将项目插入列表的开头），因此在收集后对统计信息进行预处理可能是适当的。

trans-unit.source: Defined if perCallFlags is nonzero. Outputs (e.g. to a File) a simple report of the collected per-call statistics.
trans-unit.target: 定义 perCallFlags 是否为非零。输出（例如，输出到 File ）简单的报告，包括每次呼叫统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Defined in RFC 4122 document
trans-unit.target: 在RFC 4122文件中定义

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator.deallocateAll is defined. Affects per instance and per call numDeallocateAll.
trans-unit.target: 仅在定义了 Allocator.deallocateAll 时定义。每个实例和每个调用 numDeallocateAll 的影响。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator.expand is defined. Finds the owner of b and calls expand for it. The owner is not brought to the head of the list.
trans-unit.target: 仅在定义了 Allocator.expand 时定义。查找 b 的所有者并为其 expand 调用。所有者没有被带到列表的开头。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator.owns and Allocator.deallocateAll are defined.
trans-unit.target: 仅在定义了 Allocator.owns 和 Allocator.deallocateAll 时定义。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator.reallocate is defined. Finds the owner of b and calls reallocate for it. If that fails, calls the global reallocate, which allocates a new block and moves memory.
trans-unit.target: 仅在定义了 Allocator.reallocate 时定义。查找 b 的所有者并调用为其 reallocate 。如果失败，则调用全局 reallocate ，它分配一个新块并移动内存。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator defines owns. Finds the owner of b and forwards the call to it.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Allocator 定义 owns 定义。查找 b 的所有者并将呼叫转发给它。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Allocator defines owns. Tries each allocator in turn, in most-recently-used order. If the owner is found, it is moved to the front of the list as a side effect under the assumption it will be used soon.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 Allocator 定义 owns 定义。按最近使用的顺序依次尝试每个分配器。如果找到所有者，则假定它很快就会被使用，则作为副作用将其移到列表的前面。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if Options.bytesUsed is defined. Returns bytesUsed == 0.
trans-unit.target: 仅在定义 Options.bytesUsed 时定义。返回 bytesUsed == 0 。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if ParentAllocator.alignedAllocate exists. Expansion occurs in place under the conditions required by expand. Shrinking occurs in place if goodAllocSize(b.length) == goodAllocSize(s).
trans-unit.target: 仅在 ParentAllocator.alignedAllocate 存在时定义。膨胀发生在所要求的条件下发生 expand 。如果 goodAllocSize(b.length) == goodAllocSize(s) 发生收缩。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if ParentAllocator defines deallocateAll. If so, forwards to it and resets the freelist.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 ParentAllocator 定义 deallocateAll 时定义。如果是这样，请转发给它并重置空闲列表。

trans-unit.source: Defined only if parent.alignedAllocate exists and works similarly to allocate by forwarding to parent.alignedAllocate(goodAllocSize(n), a).
trans-unit.target: 仅在 parent.alignedAllocate 存在并且与转发到 parent.alignedAllocate(goodAllocSize(n), a) 进行 allocate 类似地工作时定义。

trans-unit.source: Defined when building the standard runtime
trans-unit.target: 在构建标准运行时定义

trans-unit.source: Defined whether or not Allocator.deallocate is defined. Affects per instance: numDeallocate, bytesUsed, and bytesSlack. Affects per call: numDeallocate and bytesContracted.
trans-unit.target: 定义是否定义了 Allocator.deallocate 。每个实例的影响： numDeallocate ， bytesUsed 和 bytesSlack 。每次通话的影响： numDeallocate 和 bytesContracted 。

trans-unit.source: Defined whether or not Allocator.expand is defined. Affects per instance: numExpand, numExpandOK, bytesExpanded, bytesSlack, bytesAllocated, and bytesUsed. Affects per call: numExpand, numExpandOK, bytesExpanded, and bytesAllocated.
trans-unit.target: 定义是否定义了 Allocator.expand 。每个实例的影响： numExpand ， numExpandOK ， bytesExpanded ， bytesSlack ， bytesAllocated 和 bytesUsed 。每次调用的影响： numExpand ， numExpandOK ， bytesExpanded 和 bytesAllocated 。

trans-unit.source: Defined whether or not Allocator.reallocate is defined. Affects per instance: numReallocate, numReallocateOK, numReallocateInPlace, bytesNotMoved, bytesAllocated, bytesSlack, bytesExpanded, and bytesContracted. Affects per call: numReallocate, numReallocateOK, numReallocateInPlace, bytesNotMoved, bytesExpanded, bytesContracted, and bytesMoved.
trans-unit.target: 定义是否定义了 Allocator.reallocate 。每个实例的影响： numReallocate ， numReallocateOK ， numReallocateInPlace ， bytesNotMoved ， bytesAllocated ， bytesSlack ， bytesExpanded 和 bytesContracted 。每次调用的影响： numReallocate ， numReallocateOK ， numReallocateInPlace ， bytesNotMoved ， bytesExpanded ， bytesContracted 和 bytesMoved 。

trans-unit.source: Defines a reference-counted object containing a T value as payload.
trans-unit.target: 将包含 T 值的参考计数对象定义为有效负载。

trans-unit.source: Defines a simple, self-documenting yes/no flag. This makes it easy for APIs to define functions accepting flags without resorting to bool, which is opaque in calls, and without needing to define an enumerated type separately. Using Flag!"Name" instead of bool makes the flag's meaning visible in calls. Each yes/no flag has its own type, which makes confusions and mix-ups impossible.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个简单的，自我记录的“是/否”标志。这使API可以轻松定义接受标志的函数，而无需求助于 bool （在调用中是不透明的），而无需分别定义枚举类型。使用 Flag!"Name" 代替 bool 使该标志的含义在调用中可见。每个“是/否”标志都有其自己的类型，这使混淆和混淆变得不可能。

trans-unit.source: Defines a total order on all floating-point numbers.
trans-unit.target: 定义所有浮点数的总顺序。

trans-unit.source: Defines a value paired with a distinctive "null" state that denotes the absence of a value. If default constructed, a Nullable!T object starts in the null state. Assigning it renders it non-null. Calling nullify can nullify it again.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个与独特的“空”状态配对的值，该状态表示没有值。如果默认构造，则 Nullable!T 对象以null状态开始。分配它会使其变为非空。调用 nullify 可以再次使其无效。
